system.sustained:
Creatures within Range must oppose Focus Power Test with a Toughness Test, suffering -10 if they have the Heightened Senses (Hearing) Talent. Any that fail suffer 1d10+Psy Rating Damage and are stunned until the start of their next turn. 
Toughness Test is considered to be a test to resist poison or disease for the purpose of talents/traits/etc that may aid in resisting it.
